app_description: Language Chat: A revolutionary new way of learning languages much faster. Language Learning has never been easier. Learn Languages 10x Faster with the best language learning app by chatting in your native language. Surely you will be amazed how fast you would learn a language without hassles using this game changing app. Learn Spanish French German Italian Russian Portuguese Chinese Japanese Korean Turkish Dutch Danish Swedish Polish Norwegian Arabic Hindi or even English by chatting listening and speaking. LanguageChat is the new and best way of learning foreign languages. Chats are categorized by topics of which you can select from predefined topics or create your topics. Your current chats are under chats tab where you can continue from where you stopped. Give LanguageChat a try and see things yourself. LanguageChat App: A Combined Cloud AI Tech To Help You Learn To Speak 16 languages 10x Faster. LanguageChat App wants to change the way you should learn a language forever! You could be addicted to it. Language learning shouldn t be difficult at all. Less than 10 of those who enrolled in a World Language could engage in conversation after they finished. LanguageChat wants to change that for you! With LanguageChat App Language learning is a lot easier faster and fun. Learn a new language with LanguageChat app and say goodbye to flashCards and Say Hello to LanguageChat where you learn languages from what you are already familiar with from your native language. There s no more confusion and embarrassment in your language learning goals. LanguageChat enables you to learn any language without forgetting. LanguageChat is fun and easy to use for anyone that wants to learn a new language. Use your native language as a primary guide and start learning today! In three simple steps you are in with fun. Absolutely the easiest way to learn a language with a higher language retention. Features Unlimited Language Chats Access To 16 Complete Languages 40 Native High Quality Voices Cloud Speech Recognition Cloud Bilingual Dictionary Chat History In The Cloud Save Chats for Offline Access Non Latin Languages Script Conversions Personal Word Bank Download LanguageChat App: The best language learning app for Spanish French German Italian Russian Portuguese Chinese Japanese Korean Turkish Dutch Danish Swedish Polish Norwegian Arabic Hindi or even English Subscriptions You need a LanguageChat subscription to access all features with unlimited chat. With free trial you will get access to everything. Premium Monthly Subscription. Premium 6 Months Subscription only during promotion . Premium Annual Subscription. Once purchased subscriptions will automatically renew unless cancelled before the end of the current payment period. Subscriptions can be managed or cancelled in your iTunes Appstore Account Settings. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. In app Permissions To enable some features of the LanguageChat app we may need to ask for your permission. For instance we ll ask to access your microphone if you d like to practice your pronunciation skills using speech recognition tool. You can change permissions at any time in your phone settings. Terms of Service: https: www.languagechat.app terms Privacy Policy: https: www.languagechat.app privacy
